sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_icir_dealmaker_application_requirement"> <x_icir_dealmaker_application_requirement action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_development_estimate>2</base_development_estimate> <default_quantity>4</default_quantity> <name>Configure outbound SMS notifications</name> <notes>Quantity = Number of notifications. e.g. Opened by Me, Opened for Me, Assigned to Agent, Comments Added, Task Completed. May not need this if Push Notifications are being configured with app.</notes> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-30 23:52:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c75c68b1db782c50af7ce8cd139619f7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-12-01 00:03:43</sys_updated_on> <type>variable</type> </x_icir_dealmaker_application_requirement> </record_update>
